message: I understand you want a larger share, but I need a bit more. How about this?
Meet me in the middle of our previous offers
Time is running out, and I'm being flexible. This is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm giving you another chance
Alice, I'm serious. This is as low as I can go. Take it or leave it.
You said that was as low as you can go, but I still think I can get a better deal
We're running out of time.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option at this point. Don't be greedy, Alice.
A 50/50 split isn't fair considering the inflation, I need a little more
